response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me, but I understand its true worth extends far beyond my expectations. Given its significance and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business.

I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for someone like you who appreciates its true worth.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing. I am here to answer any questions you might have and ensure a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
